qas.question: What is the biggest ethnic group in Somalia?
What percentage of Somalians are ethnic Somalis?
During what century did the nomad lifestyle decline among Somalis?
Why do many Somalis live in South Asia and Europe?
Along with Djibouti and Ethiopia, in what African country outside Somalia can Somalis be found?

context: <a0_0>Somalis<a0_0/> constitute the largest ethnic group in Somalia, at approximately <a1_0>85%<a1_0/> of the nation's inhabitants. They are traditionally nomads, but since the late <a2_0>20th<a2_0/> century, many have moved to urban areas. While most Somalis can be found in Somalia proper, large numbers also live in Ethiopia, Djibouti, <a4_0>Kenya<a4_0/>, Yemen, the Middle East, South Asia and Europe due to <a3_0>their seafaring tradition<a3_0/>.
